query:
INSERT INTO hero_quotes (textZh, textEn, isActive) VALUES
('活著本身就是一場浩劫，夢是這世界唯一的解脫。', 'Living itself is a havoc, dreaming is the only relief in this world.', 1),
('用鏡頭捕捉瞬間，用光影訴說故事。', 'Capturing moments through the lens, telling stories with light and shadow.', 1),
('每一次快門，都是對生命的致敬。', 'Every shutter click is a tribute to life.', 1);
command:

('活著本身就是一場浩劫，夢是這世界唯一的解脫。', 'Living itself is a havoc, dreaming is the only relief in this world.', 1),
('用鏡頭捕捉瞬間，用光影訴說故事。', 'Capturing moments through the lens, telling stories with light and shadow.', 1),
('每一次快門，都是對生命的致敬。', 'Every shutter click is a tribute to life.', 1);
